channel.title: Homes on Jose Ricardo Zapata

item.description: Biography I’m a Professor at the Faculty of Information and Communication Technologies (TIC), Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana (UPB) and researcher of the Grupo de Investigaci칩n Desarrollo y Aplicaci칩n en Telecomunicaciones e Inform치tica (GIDATI) My research interests are based around sound and music information technologies, which includes information retrieval, data science and digital signal processing, with applications to music information retrieval, audio analysis and data mining.
